title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content: t Shadowheart is on a mission for Shar: she needs to bring that strange githyanki artefact to Baldur's Gate. We learned that Shadowheart is on a mission for her goddess: she needs to bring that strange githyanki artefact to Baldur's Gate. As a strange voice assailed us, we were saved by a half-elf named Shadowheart - another survivor of the nautiloid. We accepted her into our party. We witnessed Shadowheart become stricken by an unusual surge of pain, emanating from a tiny, unhealed wound on her
